pages.text: Once you have acquired arconium essence, it can be infused with a block of gold using an altar ritual (see JEI). The resulting arconium gold block gives it a special ability. If placed under a leprechaun hat that is linked to a pot of gold, the pot will slowly drain its gold contents, which it uses to automatically top itself up.

This is a far cheaper method to fill the pot than right-clicking it with gold ingots. Once the arconium gold block is drained, it will transform into a block of pure arconium which can then be mined. In pure form, it is used in altar rituals to enchant roots that will make the pot produce various items.
